name: Yoshizuki Kumichi Tanpenshuu - Kimi to Boku no Ashiato
nutshell:
Collection of illustrations and short stories:


Kimi to Boku no Ashiato (part 1)


Kimi to Boku no Ashiato (part 2)


Kanojo no Sekai


About Me


Kenka (Quarrel)


Tenohira


Natsumi

name: Study Toverload
tags: Official Colored,Long Strip,Boys' Love,Drama,School Life,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: You use studies to get me, I use love to get you.

name: My doll house - Digital Colored Comics
nutshell:
Mahiro has two goals in life: first, to finally confess to his childhood friend who he loved for so long and second, to become a famous model.
But there are various obstacles in Mahiro's path! For one thing, he dresses as a girl, named Hanabusu Arisu, when modeling.
As if that wasn't enough, every woman in his vicinity gets the urge to spread her legs because of the special pheromone he emits!
Will Mahiro ever come to confess his love to Miwa, or will he simply widen his harem and get engulfed in endless orgy?

name: Ai Ore! ~Danshikou no Hime to Joshikou no Ouji~
nutshell:
When Akira announces he was a boy in the first book "Ai wo Utau Yori Ore ni Oborero" so does the fact Akira goes to Dankaisan the boys school next to St. Nobora (Mizuki's school). Things start to get rough when pressure against Mizuki dating a boy from that school rise.

Note: Because Shinjo Mayu stopped her job relationship with Shogakukan, she continued her incomplete manga in Asuka and called it Ai Ore! This can be considered a continuation of Ai (w)o Utau Yori Ore ni Oborero! or even as a second series.

name: Gokutsuma Days: Gokudou Sankyoudai ni Semaretemasu
nutshell:
One day Sakura, a socially withdrawn otaku, saves the life of the Amogumi’s leader. How in the world did she become the highest ranking wife?!
The leader declares to the three grandsons that, “The person who defeats Sakura-san will become the next leader.”
The eldest son is weak but kind, the second son seems fierce and aggressive, and the third son is a level-headed intellectual. The three of them are all highly skilled and stubborn in their own ways…
How is this shut-in the ultimate wife?! Jeez, no thank you. “Yakuza Harem,” start!

name: Motto Aishiaimasho
nutshell: Keichi and Sora live a happy life now that they've moved in together. Keichi works as a director at a design office and Sora works as a hostess in a bar while attending university. The odd thing about all that is they're both men, and there's a third person coming in between them. Can Sora and Keichi struggle to live their happy lives in peace, or will the third person win…?

name: The Supreme Expert
nutshell: When Li Huaifeng was eight-years-old, he entered a mysterious catacomb by accident and awakened the soul of catacomb’s master, Xuanyuan Luoxue. She entered his body and took him in as her disciple. Ten years later, Li Huaifeng returned to the catacomb to recreate her soul, but it had been severely injured when he tried to save the rich Du Shishi. So, Li Huaifeng returned to human society to go on adventures and earn money to save his master’s soul.

name: Takahashi and Hirukawa
nutshell: Takahashi wakes up one day to discover he's turned into a woman. Curious about what it feels like to have sex as a woman, he asks his friend Hirukawa if he wants to have sex.

name: Brunette Bob and Black Side Ponytail
nutshell: From author page: "Heartwarming yuri between a girl with a brown bob cut and a girl with a black side ponytail"

name: Saiaku na Futari no Hajimari wa
nutshell: Hinami Takashi is always transferring schools because of his parents' jobs and he has gotten pretty bored of the attention. He uses the rumors about him to achieve his goal, which is to maintain his mediocre daily life and to quietly go on to the next school – until the rumors about his classmate Sakura make him take a special interest in him. It seems like Takashi isn't as ordinary as he pretends to be…

name: Ashonde yo - Uchi no Inu Log
nutshell:
~ If you feel depressed with your daily life, your little pet dog may comfort you. ~
Man has dog. Dog is cute. Man and Dog do cute things.

name: Gundam Build Fighters A
nutshell: 10 years ago, Tatsuya Yuuki befriended a boy who taught him all about Gunpla and battling. This is the story about the GBF world back then, showing Tatsuya’s back story and progression as an amazing builder and fighter! A side story / back story of the Gundam Build Fighters anime.

name: Discovery of romance
tags: Long Strip,Romance,Comedy,Drama,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: Every night at 10 o'clock, the story of their love goes on the radio. DJ Hee-ra's love letter. Starts now.

name: Violence Jack 20XX
nutshell:
In 20XX AD, a massive earthquake struck the Kanto region, isolating it from the rest of Japan. People called it the "Kanto Hell Earthquake". In this lawless zone where the destinies of all people have spiraled out of control, there is a small glimmer of reason... In this world where the common sense of civilized society does not apply, the boys live, stay alive, survive!!
This is a remake drawn by Kinutani Yuu. The main plot is pretty much the same as the original but the setting is more modern and the cast of characters are more fleshed out.

name: Androids wa Ai no Yume wo Miruka?
nutshell: "I'll do anything for you, Riko." After her father's death, Riko suddenly finds herself living with his parting gift: a male humanoid robot called Akito. Booting up this high-functioning robot turns Riko's calm and mundane life upside-down! Although she finds him annoying, the more she watches him, the harder it gets to turn him off… Then, one day, the curious and rather touchy-feely Akito says… "Can kissing convey my love for you?"…What's with this robot? Turns out he has a secret function…!

name: Girls und Panzer - Russo-Japanese Katyusha Alliance (Doujinshi)
Stand By Me
nutshell: Tatsuru encounters a young man looking for rice porridge during his shift at the local supermarket - unfortunately, he's sick as a dog. Turns out, he's as affectionate as one, too.

name: Omamorishimasu, Dokomademo
nutshell: Akira arrives in Tokyo from the countryside to start a new job but instead discovers that not only has his company disappeared but also his housing. Unemployed and homeless before he's even started life in the big city, life's looking pretty grim – but maybe someone's looking out for him after all, because who should text him at that moment but his childhood friend Chihiro. Providing a home, cooked meals, and even pocket money – just why is Chihiro doing so much for someone he hasn't seen since he was 10? Why does he consider Akira to be his best friend? And just who are those serious looking guys in suits? There just may be more excitement in the big city than Akira's ever dreamed possible.

name: Harry Potter - Potter Addicts (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A very fluffy story about Sirius and Remus that takes place after the end of book three.

name: Mommy Is Coming, Daddy Watch Out!
nutshell: She, the sexy hot superstar, is 100% black-hearted. He, the sole heir of the Ye family's century-old wealth, monopolizes the brilliance. Their encounter, doomed to spread like wildfire. Ye Jinze: "Keke, you promised you would be responsible for me seven years ago." An Keke: "You believed me?"

name: My classmate, Maejima, is really cute
tags: Oneshot,Long Strip,Romance,Comedy,School Life,Web Comic,Slice of Life
nutshell: Maejima is really cute.

name: Mother's Spirit
nutshell:
University employee Ryouichirou is ordered by the Chairman to take in an exchange student. That exchange student, Qaltaqa, is a native from a developing country who can't understand Japanese! Though he is a warrior of his tribe and a man of great beauty, seeing him afraid of the phone and the TV – and even the toilet – Ryouichirou gets fed up…
But while being called "Ryouichirou" in such a clumsy manner, he has a change of heart!?

name: Tengoku no Hakoniwa
nutshell: A world where humankind was almost destroyed by the nuclear war. Lily, a girl who hides under a cliff, and Selene, an android who serves her. Selene was the only support and love for Lily, who lives with the faint hope of "living on earth again someday." The end-of-life GL story of "Android x Girl" presented by the creator of "Kowamoto-kun's Maiden Alliance" and "Alice's Paradise".

name: Kanade
nutshell: A high school student has been seeing visions of a girl in his dreams, when suddenly he meets her at school. Oddly, they can both see (and touch) each other's guardian spirits. What is relationship between them, their guardians, and the truth behind the dreams?

name: Muttsuri Girl to Koisuru Bitch
nutshell: Author's Twitter

name: Nyotaimori
nutshell:
"Why is sashimi used for nyotaimori?"
Confused by this very question just after coming back from abroad, Emily-san is researching further. She feels this isn't right and that we can do better; but nyotaimori is the "tradition" of eating on a girl's body...
This cute little oneshot was originally published in Author's Fanbox for their supporters which is now unavailable. Don't forget to check out their PIXIV FANBOX by clicking on the Author's Name!

name: Aria at Dawn
nutshell: The era is the Taisho period (1912-1926). Kaibara Aria, who wishes to become a pianist, takes the examination to become a preparatory student at the Tokyo School of Music. The passion in her playing overwhelms her surroundings, like a ripple on the surface of water. It was then that Aria had an encounter with the son of the Nishimikado noble family, Natsuo, and learns a shocking truth… The youth of the maiden blessed by the god of music in this stream of musical romance!
